title: Ticket #3674: Nathan Panike brain dump
description:
Nathan will be separating from the HTCondor team to take a new position elsewhere. This ticket will document brain dumps of useful information he has picked up and make sure it gets transferred appropriately.

  1. DAGMan (to Kent)
  2. LMCG Infrastructure (to Infrastructure)
  3. LMCG HTCondor Workflow (to Lauren? or AlanD?) -- discussed with Lauren on 12 June 2013
  4. Biochemistry Senes Engagement (to Lauren) notes -- discused with Lauren 12 June 2013.
  5. Oak Ridge Engagement. I got my security credentials, but never used this, so I know only what Cathrin told me
  6. LWN subscription (to Matyas)
  7. iRods (to Zach) see below. -- discussed with Zach 12 June 2013
  8. Transfer git bag-n-tag (to Jaime) see blurb at BagAndTag
  9. Transfer htcondorbot (to AlanD)
  10. Matlab stuff. See Giang Doan. Also brain-dumped to AlanD; see code in AFS /p/condor/CONDOR_MATLAB.
